#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
struct node
{
    int bound;
    int change;
};

bool operator<(node n1,node n2)
{
    return n1.bound<n2.bound;
}

int main()
{
    int tests,i,left,right,maximum,j,curr,x,y;
    node s[200010];
    cin >> tests;
    for(j=0,i=0;j<tests;i+=2,++j)
    {
        cin >> x >> y;
        if(y<x) swap(x,y);
        s[i].bound=x;
        s[i].change=1;
        s[i+1].bound=y+1;
        s[i+1].change=-1;
    }
    sort(s,s+(2*tests));
    maximum=0;
    curr=0;
    for(i=0;i<(2*tests);++i)
    {
        curr+=s[i].change;
        // cout<<"s[i].a: "<<s[i].a<<" s[i].ch: "<<s[i].ch<<endl;
        if(curr>maximum) maximum=curr;
    }
    cout << maximum;
    // system("pause");
}
